jump_scares.spoiler: A sudden bang on the window startles Manuel and Altair
Manuel turns around with the camera, and Altair is standing right in front of him
Manuel turns the camera down from the ceiling and spots Altair standing in front of him with her back turned
While unresponsively sitting on a chair and looking down, Altair suddenly grabs the camera as Manuel points it at her
A door suddenly slams shut on its own
While lying on the floor, Altair suddenly springs upwards and begins to scream
The ceiling lamp suddenly explodes
While Altair plays with something bloody in her hands, an inhuman hand suddenly reaches and grabs her
After Scarlett puts down the phone, a man’s voice starts talking from behind the group
Mole, the presumed dead friend of one of the group members, jumps at the group when approached by Souxie. [Video]
The ghost jumps again when further approached
Benji gets attacked by a lady
A sculpture on the wall breaks off and attacks the group
A hand reaches out of the water and grabs Scarlett
Scarlett lifts the sack on a hanging person’s head when that person jumps at her. [Video]
A dog runs towards Darrin
Darrin turns the camera and is startled by Raid
Darrin is startled by a water stream
A loud bang
Aaron is startled by Josef while in his car
Josef surfaces from under the water in the bathtub
Aaron pulls back a curtain and is startled by a scary mask
Josef jumps out from behind a boulder and scares Aaron
Josef jumps out of a doorway and scares Aaron as he is entering the house
Josef wakes up suddenly
There is a noise
Josef starts speaking behind Aaron
Aaron is startled by a loud noise while he is in bed
Josef appears in front of the camera and lets out a scream. [Video]
As Ray clicks through the endlessly scrolling hallway, a ghost suddenly appears on screen
Ray’s camera turns back on and a scary face briefly flashes across the window
Rachel clicks the painting of the forest and it opens a video file, and a scary face immediately flashes in front of the camera in the video
The image of Amy with her face covered immediately shifts to reveal her face is distorted
There is a loud screech and the screen begins to glitch out

The image of Rachel and Amy begins to pop up all over the screen, then all of the images suddenly disappear off the screen to reveal Ray’s face looking very over-exposed and bleeding in front of the camera
A dog barks during a tense scene
Zach, who appears to be asleep, suddenly jumps out of bed to scare Sam
During what appears to be some sort of ritual, there is a sudden bright light accompanied by a high pitched noise
Sam grabs Zach’s wrist
There is a sudden cut to a dog barking
The sound of a door being pushed open during a tense scene may startle some viewers
Sam suddenly appears in front of the camera screaming “get out”. [Video]
Father Thomas suddenly yells at Zach
A girl is pulled into the air by a supernatural force
Sam screams and the door slams shut. A few seconds later the door is blasted off it’s hinges
Sam screams and the furniture lifts off the ground
Sam screams once more and the pictures on the wall fly into the opposite wall
Sam tilts her neck causing Zach to go flying backwards
A bloody man runs towards the camera. Footage from original film
A person appears in the mirror
A bloody man is on the ceiling. Footage from the original film
A man bloody man jumps out of the bathtub. Footage from original film
The spirit board arrow jump out of their hands
A loud bang
The furniture in the room gets flipped over
Jerry is pulled out the window
A loud noise is heard
A childs face distorts and screams
A door flies open
A loud noise is heard
The security guard wakes up
A man with a distorted face crashes through the window
A jet of steam busts from a pipe
A man runs at the thermal camera
A child with a distorted face runs towards the camera in the vent
Sean jumps
A loud bang is heard
A light suddenly switches on
A ghostly women jumps into view
The camera rounds a corner to see a clown figure standing in the hallway
A scary-looking clown’s head is suddenly looking straight at the camera
A clown figure is seen standing in a doorway at the bottom of stairs
Bedcovers are lifted to reveal a  girl’s bloody face
The camera turns back to reveal scary clown mannequins sitting on the ground
A black figure standing behind a girl suddenly moves towards the camera, while screams are heard

movies.title: Hell House LLC III: Lake of Fire

jump_scares.spoiler: The camera spins around to see bloody girl with yellow eyes and black lips appears in front of the camera (reused footage from second film)
A woman with pale eyes is seen in a dark basement (reused footage from second film)
The camera turns around to reveal a woman’s face
The camera focuses on the severed head of a blonde woman hanging on the wall
The lights come on to reveal a man being attacked by another man, his head covered in blood
A knock is heard at Seylan’s door, which is revealed to just be a late delivery
Jemma suddenly screams loudly as she claims to have felt something touch her neck
Haley is suddenly dragged backwards in her chair
A loud thud is heard
Emma’s drinking glass suddenly shatters
A warbling sound is heard as the lights in everyone’s rooms begin to flicker
Caroline becomes visible through her virtual background as she appears to fall towards the webcam, knocking the laptop over
Emma’s camera pans down and a floating face filter is seen
Emma’s cabinet doors burst open
Alan’s body falls to the floor behind Radina
Caroline once again becomes visible through her virtual background as she starts repeatedly slamming her head
Haley’s chair gets pulled away
A mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view
Another mysterious face appears in Teddy’s view as loud screaming is heard
Thudding is heard in the distance
Teddy’s flashlight explodes
A scream is heard as another explosion occurs, blowing Teddy backwards
Emma screams loudly after she throws a blanket and it lands in mid-air
A window shatters off-screen as Jemma breaks into Haley’s house
Jemma’s hand reaches for the camera
Haley’s cabinets and drawers burst open
Hayley appears from under the desk as her chair knocks over
As Haley snaps a portrait, a mysterious and bloodied figure suddenly screams and lunges towards her and Jemma, but is then abruptly cut off due to the Zoom meeting reaching its time limit
As the cameraman slowly looks around the garage, he sees the landlord standing in the darkness and reaching out for him
While the cameraman walks through the dark alleyway, a pane of glass shatters by itself
Dennis turns around and gasps as Kristi is standing right behind him
A photo-frame falls off the wall as an earthquake begins suddenly
Julie jumps out of the closet wearing a mask, scaring Dennis and Randy. [Video]
Dennis bursts into the bedroom
There is a loud bang in the kitchen as the blinds snap shut
There is a loud thump as Julie enters the bathroom where the two girls are playing bloody Mary
There is a loud bang in the kitchen while Julie has her hand in the garbage disposal unit
Katie crawls into a cupboard and the door slams shut behind her
As the camera pans back to the kitchen, the babysitter’s face suddenly appears in front of it
The camera pans back to the kitchen and there is a figure covered by a blanket standing behind the  babysitter. The blanket crumples to the floor as the babysitter turns around
The babysitter goes to look at something but there is a whooshing noise and she is pushed back
There is a hissing noise and Randi is attacked by something while the lights are off
The table and chairs in the children’s room are suddenly pushed over
An invisible force pulls Katie off the ground by her hair
Katie’s sheets are pulled off the bed and fly towards the camera
Julie returns to the kitchen and notices everything has been removed from the kitchen, seconds later all the kitchen items fall from the ceiling. [Video]
Dennis turns on the light in the garage and a group of older women are standing in there
Julie is thrown at Dennis
Dennis opens the door slowly, and there is a whooshing noise
A now possessed Katie turns around and snarls at Dennis before throwing him backwards. [Video]
A child appears in the window
A trapdoor opens and Margo is pulled away
A snowman appears in front of them
A child appears
Someone yells
The door breaks open
Margot is pulled into the air
The gun goes off
The creature appears below Chris
Dale is grabbed from behind
Chris lands beside Margot and scares her
The creature comes around the hay bale
A villager is hitting the window with a tool
After Marika begins to groan and enters some sort of trance, several birds slam into the window
After seeing some camera footage, Hori suddenly becomes very agitated
Some birds fly out at Kobayashi as he opens a sliding door
A sudden cut from a quiet scene where Kana is sleeping to an earlier scene where Hori is screaming may startle some viewers
After a series of slow moving grayscale images, there is a sudden rattle and a face flies at the screen
An identical repeat of the last jump scare, but instead of a face, there is a burning portrait and a scream
There is a rattle and the stick-toy quickly flashes on the screen
As Rebecca runs through the dark attic, the cult leader jumps out in front of her
There is a loud bang, and the camera footage cuts out
A lady on the television screen suddenly lunges at the camera
Maria suddenly starts to scream at Isabella
A dog barks at Isabella from behind a fence
The light turns on and Rosalita is now out of the bed and screaming at the crew
Maria suddenly starts screaming
There is a loud bang while Isabella and Ben are talking
The camera moves around the room and David is seen standing behind Ben
Various small scares for the next few seconds as actors scare the group
As the doll girl appears there is a sudden scream
Someone jumps out of the curtains as someone says “ashes
Mickey is scared by a man in a mask
A little girl comes out from the left side and then a few seconds later a man comes out of the wall directly in front of the camera
As the camera is facing the mirror there is a sudden cut
The lights come on and reveal a lot of clowns surrounding the vehicle
He is jumped by the doll girl
Mikey slams a hand against the window
Caleb throws a rock at the back window as Daniel begins to drive away
Nell’s bed starts to shake
Nell suddenly rushes at the cat and starts beating it with the camera
Nell cuts Marcus and runs away
Nell suddenly attacks the cameraman
Accompanied by a sound effect, the camera zooms in on an occult symbol on the wall
Daniel hears a noise and spins the camera around to see Caleb standing right in front of him
A fully possessed Mink jumps at the camera and screams
Mink is standing in the filed before attacking the crew
Mink pulls out a knife and attacks
A possessed person jumps out in front of the cameraman
A previously quiet scene is interrupted by high pitched static
A man wearing a scary mask appears in front of the camera (accompanied by a sound effect)
Michael suddenly jolts awake
The medium suddenly grabs Michael and there is a burst of static
Michael suddenly screams as the footage distorts and we get another burst of static
The footage cuts to a close up of a stereo accompanied by a loud static noise
During Michael’s hypnotism, everything goes quiet briefly before Michael suddenly appears standing directly in front of the camera
A bird flies into the window
Ellie’s toy makes a noise from behind Michael
A trashcan falls over making a loud noise
Michael in the television footage suddenly turns and looks at the real Michael and once again this is accompanied by a static sound effect
Michael opens a drawer to reveal a bloodied knife and a static sound effect plays once more
Something sparks in the background after Michael says “Why are you doing this?
The book Michael is reading from is suddenly thrown away by an unseen force
Michael violently spasms several times as he lies handcuffed to the bed
As Michael reaches for the phone of the floor, a bloodied hand hangs down from the ceiling
Michael headbutts the mirror
The plug holding the hairdryer explodes
After Michael jumps out of the house, we see Michael lying motionless on the ground for several seconds before we hear a thudding noise and the camera moves slightly
As Samantha bends down to pick up the coin, a car slams into her
The pilot is shot
Jake jumps down in front of the camera
Luis spins the camera back around and Deborah is suddenly standing right in front of him
A door slams
Sarah suddenly appears in the room and begins talking to Deborah
Deborah screams into the camera
Deborah suddenly attacks Sarah
Deborah suddenly appears in front of Luis. [Video
A phone rings loudly
A door slams shut
A loud noise startles the group
A loud bang comes from outside followed by several more over the next few seconds
A loud bang startles the group
The television suddenly comes off its stand and slams into Harris
A snake crawls out of the bag
A face can briefly be seen in the window
Deborah suddenly bites the security guard on the neck
Deborah spits at one of the police officers
A window breaks in front of Sarah and Mia
Sarah slowly approaches Deborah in an attempt to sedate her, however Deborah spins around and attacks her. [Video
Deborah opens her mouth in a horribly contorted manner and roars at Sarah
An eye appears in the man’s belongings
A man appears in front of the camera
Banging from the coffin knocks things over
Mr. Edwards turns around
Hayley looks around with the camera and a severed hand moving around on its own causes her to scream
Hayley looks up from the ground and Mr. Edwards is running straight at her
One of the soldiers reaches out for the woman who quickly grabs him on the arm
There is a sudden loud noise during a quiet scene as someone gets attacked in another room
The police officer appears behind her
The subject runs into frame and rams into the soldier from the side
A strange creature eats a man’s face
The creature reappears
There is a short scream and the webcam, which was focused on Val, suddenly falls to the ground
There is a loud thud and the webcam moves to Val’s motionless body lying on the ground
There are several seconds of broken video from Ken’s webcam which show a distressed Ken being slammed into the computer desk and putting his hands and face in a blender
Jess’s webcam shows a brief image of her crouching on the bathroom floor screaming. Several seconds later the webcam shows Jess with a hair straightener in her mouth
Hands reach down and close the laptop screen, accompanied by a loud NO!, a few seconds later the ghost of Laura lunges at the screen
Loud noise from silence as a man plugs in a microphone
A raccoon makes a noise
Something hits the side of Kelly & Jim’s tent
Something hits the side of Kelly and Jim’s tent
Something crashes down in the forest behind Kelly
Something jumps from behind a bush at Kelly
Something makes a noise in the forest behind Kelly and Jim
Something breaks a stick in the forest near the characters
Naked woman appears moaning
Something drags camera away from frame
